resources.string: Hi! My name is MailBot and I am here to deliver your letters or your parcels to anyone in the EEE building!\n\nChoose what type of mail item you want to deliver to start organising your delivery!
All lockers of this size are full
That\'s great! I just need to know a little bit about you...
Perfect! Now please tell us the details of the recipient of your mail item.
Please give a valid email address
Please confirm to me that the details below are correct.
I have opened locker X for your mail item! Please store it there so I can deliver it, and close the locker before continuing.
I put the parcel in and closed the locker!
The mail item is too big to fit in MailBot

Thank you for giving me your mail! It will be delivered in the next delivery slot time, and a confirmation e-mail with the security code for the recipient to open the locker has been sent to both you and the recipient. Use the buttons below to send another mail item to the same recipient, or begin again!
I am now delivering the mail items that have been handed to me! If you want to send your own mail item, find me in reception at the next collection time!
That\'s the correct password! A locker for your mail item has been opened! Please retrieve your item, and then close the locker.
